original: Nosaññojanaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanosaññojanaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no saññojanam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na no saññojanam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Noganthaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nooghaṁ …pe… noyogaṁ …pe… nonīvaraṇaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nogantham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe no ogham pe no yogam pe no nīvaraṇa saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Noparāmāsaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na uparāmāsam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
